notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was partially funded by CESAM (UID/AMB/50017-POCI-01-0145-FEDER-007638), to FCT/MCTES through national funds (PIDDAC), and co-funding by the FEDER within the PT2020 Partnership Agreement and Compete 2020, and by the Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia (FCT), under the projects UID/BIA/04325/2013—MEDTBIO, and UID/BIM/04773/2013 CBMR.
